input_shape._description: The shape of input tensor. If the value is '28,32,3', the height is 28, width is 32, and the number of channels is 3. The values is separated by comma. Only 3 dimension shape is allowed. Default is '28,28,3'.

fine_tune._description: If True, all trainable variables in network will be trained. If false, only variables in the parameter 'Trainable Scopes' will be trained.

trainable_scopes._description: Scopes to be trained. Ignored when 'Fine Tune' is True.

min_depth._description: Minimum depth value (number of channels) for all convolution ops. Enforced when depth_multiplier < 1, and not an active constraint when depth_multiplier >= 1.

depth_multiplier._description: Float multiplier for the depth (number of channels) for all convolution ops. The value must be greater than zero. Typical usage will be to set this value in (0, 1) to reduce the number of parameters or computation cost of the model.

finegrain_classification_mode._description: When set to True, the model will keep the last layer large even for small multipliers.

divisible_by._description: If provided will ensure that all layers # channels will be divisible by this number.

weight_decay._description: The weight decay to use for regularizing the model.

stddev._description: The standard deviation of the trunctated normal weight initializer.

dropout_keep_prob._description: The percentage of activation values that are retained.

regularize_depthwise._description: Whether or not apply regularization on depthwise.

bn_decay._description: Decay for batch norm moving average.
